lead_paragraph: Terrell Owens was sued by the Eagles, who said he owed almost $770,000 in bonus money he failed to repay after his suspension from the team. Drew Rosenhaus, Owens’s agent, declined to comment.
snippet: Terrell Owens was sued by the Eagles, who said he owed almost $770,000 in bonus money he failed to repay after his suspension from the team. Drew Rosenhaus, Owens’s agent, declined to comment.
